text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I finally did it! A new record time for<n>meee!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're three days into our summer<n>camp. Every day, El and
I train for<n>hours under the hot rays of the sun.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Don't underestimate an Umamusume<n>from the scorching
sands! Burning<n>heat, searing winds—blazin' sands!<n>I've
conquered them all!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: All right, now to run from one side of<n>the beach to the other!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El's progress since coming to this<n>summer camp has been<n>
extraordinary, to say the least. I have<n>to make sure I match
her enthusiasm—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Trainer, are you even listenin'?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! This again?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I bet you're just thinkin' about<n>training again, aren'tcha?
You totally<n>zoned out when I talked about the<n>festival
yesterday, too...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You've been all work-only mode this<n>camp, ignorin' me left
and right!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, you're almost at three<n>strikes! Next time you ignore
me, I'll<n>become a storm of anger, a raging<n>wind—an
erupting volcano! So be<n>careful, okay?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Then we're good! Anyways, like I<n>was saying...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm done preparin' for tonight's<n>"El's Hotter-than-the-Sun
Infernal<n>Training from Beyond!" Make sure<n>you wear
something easy to move in!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yup, it's a super intensive<n>two-person training session just
for<n>you and me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I've made preparations so that you<n>can train along with me!
I even got a<n>tire just for you!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
...Wait, you aren't gonna say you<n>forgot about this plan, are
you?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I know you're not the type ofperson to say, "Did I agree to that," or,"I never heard about this," rightbefore we do something, riiight?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Man, I'm gettin' hyped for tonight!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and since we're the dynamic duo,<n>it's natural for us to
at least sync up<n>our breathing.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
First, we'll run the beach and swim<n>the ocean... then we'll
climb the hills<n>and slide down through the forest...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, we're gonna do some<n>hardcore training fit for a
summer<n>camp! I won't go easy on either of<n>us!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Looks like I have no choice but to go<n>along with El's plan.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Her wings glimmer in the dead of<n>night! Blessed by the
heavens, it's<n>none other than El Condor Pasaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, it's time for our infernal<n>training! Trainer, can I get
your<n>thoughts before the match?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Looks like you're pumped! I'm<n>excited to see how
far that spirit of<n>yours takes you tonight!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And here we aaaaare!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Si! It's a bright and fun summer<n>festival!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Here, we'll do some training to help<n>you replenish both your
body and<n>mind!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Recently, all you do is work, work,<n>and work some more.
Whether we're<n>on break or in the middle of meal<n>
time—you never stop looking at your<n>papers!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You sleep late, but get up early! I bet<n>you're totally
sleep-deprived, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: So today, feel free to just enjoy<n>yourself and have fun!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, I smell something spicy over<n>there! It's tacos, no
doubt about it!<n>Hurry, quickly—let's sprint! I'll go buy<n>us
some!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
We don't have even a second to<n>waste! We're gonna
enjoy this<n>festival as much, as fully, and as<n>awesomely
as we possibly can!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa grabs me by the<n>hand and takes me around
several<n>food stalls...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Munch, munch... Ah, Twainer.Wanna twy golish soopin neth?
choice_data_list: Finish eating before you talk, okay?
Finish eating before you talk, okay?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gulp... Haha, now that's theTrainer I know.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Keep the good vibes going! Just go<n>with the flow and have
some fun!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Act natural, don't think too hard—just<n>be yourself!
Otherwise, the future me<n>will be in a pinch.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yup. Listen up, okay? As you know, I<n>will one day carve my
name in the<n>annals of history.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And just like my pro-wrestler papa,<n>I'll win a bunch of
races! I can already<n>hear the cheers, the never-ending<n>
applause! I can see the two of us<n>standing tall!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's when I'll point my finger at<n>you and say, "Applause
for my trainer,<n>who made me into a champion."

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I stole that line from Papa.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's why I need you to stayhealthy—for future me, and futureyou.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Because the two of us will become<n>the world's strongest
duo.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ...Think you can promise me that?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno! A passionate promise! I'm<n>glad I brought you to this
festival<n>today!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now, why don't we start our infernal<n>festival training?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! The tacos, takoyaki, and<n>yakisoba from earlier
were just to<n>prepare us for the training yet to<n>come!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
This festival's just gettin' started!<n>While we're here,
we're gonna<n>conquer every last one of these food<n>stalls!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, with El by my side, I enjoy a<n>rare break at the
summer festival.
